title: Active Site Exploration of Core–Corona Structured Bifunctional Cobalt Ferrite–Containing Nitrogen-Doped Carbon Nanotubes for Rechargeable Zinc–Air Battery Application
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00084F, Paper

Shankar Baskaran, Anook Nazer Eledath, Azhagumuthu Muthukrishnan
The first-row transition metals-containing bifunctional electrocatalysts are essential in developing metal-air batteries with high cycling efficiency. The core-corona structured porous N-doped carbon with tangled carbon nanotubes was synthesised by pyrolysing...
